subject: Business
title: What Product-Market Fit Actually Means
description: One-minute skill: What Product-Market Fit Actually Means.

hook.text: Marc Andreessen says product-market fit is the only thing that matters for a startup.

buildup.text: It means making something a market is desperate to buy â€” not just willing to try.

discovery.text: When you have it, customers pull the product from your hands. Growth feels almost effortless.

twist.text: Before fit, everything feels like pushing a boulder uphill. After fit, you can barely keep up.

climax.text: Superhuman surveys users: 'How would you feel without us?' If 40% say devastated, that's fit.

punchline.text: If you have to convince people they need it, you don't have it.

quiz.question: What benchmark does Superhuman use for product-market fit?
options: 40% of users would be very disappointed without the product
Positive unit economics in quarter one
